name: Hensley Partners
goal:
Hensley Partners works closely with clients to help them understand key EU and global policy and legislative issues. From there it is possible to understand the implications they have for the organisation.
By understanding the legislative environment and the upcoming change, it is possible to prepare for that change.
interests: Climate Action, Communication, Consumer Affairs, External Relations, Food Safety, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Research and Technology
euInitiatives: Industry policy, Environment policy, Data Protection, Cyber security, plastics and the circular economy
